def create_callforpapers_html(papers_data):
    # Parse dates and sort (most recent first, then by journal name)
    # Convert "Ongoing" to a far future date for sorting purposes
    for paper in papers_data:
        if paper['due_date'] == 'Ongoing':
            paper['sort_date'] = datetime(9999, 12, 31)
            paper['display_date'] = 'Ongoing'
        else:
            paper['sort_date'] = datetime.strptime(paper['due_date'], '%Y-%m-%d')
            paper['display_date'] = paper['sort_date'].strftime('%B %d, %Y')
    
    # Sort by date (earliest first), but put "Ongoing" at the end
    sorted_papers = sorted(papers_data, key=lambda x: (x['sort_date'], x['journal']))
    
    html = """
    <style>
        .callforpapers-table {
            width: 100%;
            border-collapse: collapse;
            margin: 20px 0;
            font-size: 14px;
            box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        .callforpapers-table thead tr {
            background-color: #dc3545;
            color: white;
            text-align: left;
            font-weight: bold;
        }
        .callforpapers-table th,
        .callforpapers-table td {
            padding: 12px 15px;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
        }
        .callforpapers-table tbody tr {
            border-bottom: 1px solid #dddddd;
        }
        .callforpapers-table tbody tr:nth-of-type(even) {
            background-color: #f3f3f3;
        }
        .callforpapers-table tbody tr:hover {
            background-color: #f8d7da;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        .callforpapers-table tbody tr.upcoming-deadline {
            background-color: #fff3cd;
            border-left: 4px solid #ffc107;
        }
        .callforpapers-table tbody tr.upcoming-deadline:hover {
            background-color: #ffe69c;
        }
    </style>
    <table class="callforpapers-table">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Journal</th>
                <th>Due Date</th>
                <th>Topic</th>
                <th>Project</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
    """
    
    current_date = datetime.now()
    
    for paper in sorted_papers:
        # Highlight upcoming deadlines (within 60 days)
        row_class = ""
        if paper['due_date'] != 'Ongoing':
            days_until = (paper['sort_date'] - current_date).days
            if 0 <= days_until <= 60:
                row_class = ' class="upcoming-deadline"'
        
        website_html = f"<a href='{paper['website']}' target='_blank' style='color: #007bff;'>Link</a>"
        # Format Journal column with journal name and website link below
        journal_cell = f"<strong>{paper['journal']}</strong><br>{website_html}"
        
        # Add project links - support multiple project-specific links
        projects = paper.get('projects', [])
        if projects and isinstance(projects, list) and len(projects) > 0:
            project_links = []
            for project_url in projects:
                project_links.append(f"<a href='{project_url}' target='_blank' style='color: #007bff;'>Link</a>")
            project_cell = "<br>".join(project_links)
        else:
            project_cell = ""
        
        html += f"""
            <tr{row_class}>
                <td>{journal_cell}</td>
                <td>{paper['display_date']}</td>
                <td>{paper['topic']}</td>
                <td>{project_cell}</td>
            </tr>
        """
    
    html += """
        </tbody>
    </table>
    """
    return html

display(HTML(create_callforpapers_html(call_for_papers)))

<script>
const journalISSNs = [
    "1476-4687", "2058-5276", "1740-1534", "1474-1784", "1548-7105", "1533-4406",
    "1474-547X", "1538-3598", "1097-4172", "1934-6069", "1095-9203", "1537-6591",
    "1474-4457", "2666-5247", "1098-6596", "1095-8274", "1946-6242", "1529-2916",
    "1474-1741", "1759-5053", "1535-2900", "1546-170X", "1545-9985", "1476-5381",
    "1476-4679", "1755-4349", "2522-5839", "2522-5812", "1750-2799", "2056-676X",
    "2662-8449", "1521-0081", "1521-0103", "1553-7374", "2470-9468", "1362-4962",
    "1474-760X", "1471-0064", "1367-4811", "1520-5126", "1549-9626", "1549-960X",
    "2662-8457", "1546-1696", "1546-1718", "1471-0080", "1474-1776", "1473-3099",
    "1756-1833", "1520-6890", "1545-3278", "1545-3251", "1545-4509", "1522-1601",
    "1522-1210", "1522-1563", "1522-1555", "1522-1539", "1522-1547", "1522-1466",
    "1531-2267", "1758-0463"
];

function buildPubMedUrl() {
    const pathogen = document.getElementById('pathogen-input').value.trim();
    const topic = document.getElementById('topic-input').value.trim();
    
    if (!pathogen) {
        showFeedback('Please enter a pathogen name.', 'warning');
        return null;
    }
    
    // Build the search term
    let searchTerm = `("${pathogen}"[tiab])`;
    if (topic) {
        searchTerm = `("${pathogen}"[tiab] AND "${topic}"[tiab])`;
    }
    
    // Build journal filter
    const journalFilter = journalISSNs.map(issn => `"${issn}"[ta]`).join(' OR ');
    
    // Combine into full query
    const fullQuery = `${searchTerm} AND (${journalFilter})`;
    
    // Build the URL
    const encodedQuery = encodeURIComponent(fullQuery);
    const url = `https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/?term=${encodedQuery}&sort=date&size=200`;
    
    // Show preview
    document.getElementById('url-preview').style.display = 'block';
    document.getElementById('generated-url').textContent = url;
    
    // Open in new tab
    window.open(url, '_blank');
    showFeedback('Search opened in a new tab!', 'success');
    
    return url;
}

function copyPubMedUrl() {
    const pathogen = document.getElementById('pathogen-input').value.trim();
    const topic = document.getElementById('topic-input').value.trim();
    
    if (!pathogen) {
        showFeedback('Please enter a pathogen name first.', 'warning');
        return;
    }
    
    // Build the URL without opening it
    let searchTerm = `("${pathogen}"[tiab])`;
    if (topic) {
        searchTerm = `("${pathogen}"[tiab] AND "${topic}"[tiab])`;
    }
    
    const journalFilter = journalISSNs.map(issn => `"${issn}"[ta]`).join(' OR ');
    const fullQuery = `${searchTerm} AND (${journalFilter})`;
    const encodedQuery = encodeURIComponent(fullQuery);
    const url = `https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/?term=${encodedQuery}&sort=date&size=200`;
    
    // Show preview
    document.getElementById('url-preview').style.display = 'block';
    document.getElementById('generated-url').textContent = url;
    
    // Copy to clipboard
    navigator.clipboard.writeText(url).then(() => {
        showFeedback('URL copied to clipboard!', 'success');
    }).catch(() => {
        showFeedback('Failed to copy URL. Please copy it manually from below.', 'warning');
    });
}

function clearInputs() {
    document.getElementById('pathogen-input').value = '';
    document.getElementById('topic-input').value = '';
    document.getElementById('url-preview').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('feedback-message').style.display = 'none';
}

function showFeedback(message, type) {
    const feedbackEl = document.getElementById('feedback-message');
    feedbackEl.textContent = message;
    feedbackEl.style.display = 'block';
    
    if (type === 'success') {
        feedbackEl.style.background = '#d4edda';
        feedbackEl.style.color = '#155724';
        feedbackEl.style.border = '1px solid #c3e6cb';
    } else if (type === 'warning') {
        feedbackEl.style.background = '#fff3cd';
        feedbackEl.style.color = '#856404';
        feedbackEl.style.border = '1px solid #ffeeba';
    }
    
    // Auto-hide after 4 seconds
    setTimeout(() => {
        feedbackEl.style.display = 'none';
    }, 4000);
}

// Allow Enter key to trigger search
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const inputs = document.querySelectorAll('#pathogen-input, #topic-input');
    inputs.forEach(input => {
        input.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
            if (e.key === 'Enter') {
                buildPubMedUrl();
            }
        });
    });
});
</script>
